deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Västtrafik using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, Home Assistant could not connect to the Västtrafik API. Please check your internet connection and the status of the Västtrafik API, then restart Home Assistant to try again, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: [%key:component::vasttrafik::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_auth::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring Västtrafik using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, invalid API credentials were found. Please update your YAML configuration with valid credentials, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: Västtrafik YAML configuration deprecated

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_station_not.description:
Configuring Västtrafik using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, there was a problem importing the depature board for station {station}. Please check the name in the YAML configuration, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_station_not.title: [%key:component::vasttrafik::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_auth::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Västtrafik using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, an unknown error occurred. Please restart Home Assistant to try again, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: [%key:component::vasttrafik::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_auth::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_success.description:
Configuring Västtrafik using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

Your YAML configuration has been successfully imported into the UI. You can now safely remove the `vasttrafik` sensor configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant.
deprecated_yaml_import_success.title: Västtrafik YAML configuration successfully imported

abort.not_configurable: The main integration is not configurable via options

init.description: The main Västtrafik integration settings cannot be changed. Use subentries to add departure boards.
init.title: Configure Västtrafik
